import React, { useState } from "react" import { useTranslation, withTranslation } from "react-i18next" import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Row, Col, Button, Label, Input, Modal, Card, CardBody, CardFooter, InputGroup, } from "reactstrap" import { AvForm, AvField, AvGroup } from "availity-reactstrap-validation" const ModalCargaTrabajo = (props) => { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); // Submitimos formulario para busqueda de clientes function handleSubmit(event, errors, values) { event.preventDefault(); if (errors.length > 0) { return; } values.contractAmount=Number(values.contractAmount); values.pendingAmount=Number(values.pendingAmount); values.initialPlan=Number(values.initialPlan); values.endPlan=Number(values.endPlan); values.executedPercentage=Number(values.executedPercentage); values.percentageTobeExecuted=Number(values.percentageTobeExecuted); values.expectedExecution=Number(values.expectedExecution); if (props.tipo == "CARGATRABAJO") { props.saveData(values, props.tipo); } if (props.tipo == "ECARGATRABAJO") { values.cashFlowWorkloadId = props.jsonSow.cashFlowWorkloadId; values.status = true; props.updateData(values, props.tipo); } } return (
{t("Workload")}
{props.botones ? : null}
); }; ModalCargaTrabajo.propTypes = { isOpen: PropTypes.bool, toggle: PropTypes.func }; export default ModalCargaTrabajo;
